name: Dice Warrior
description:
Here, by constantly exploring the dungeons, you can find a lot of powerful skills that can be combined. We store all the magic runes in dice, so it will be distinguished from traditional card games. Natural ability, skill collocation, character specific ability ... These factors can form a wonderful experience.Game features
  • There are 2 different roles to choose from now (there will be new roles later)
  • Magic runes all in the dice, compared with traditional card games, there will be a probability difference
  • The role of a growth system, focusing on enhancing the role of the ability to help you a lot
  • Randomly generated dungeons, every step needs careful consideration
  • A large number of monster combinations must not be taken lightly
  • Choose the magic Rune in your hand carefully. It is the key to deciding whether you can go to the endGame continues to updateThe game will continue to be updated, and there will be more than one way to play, and more and more skill cards and characters
